data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module transforms between unicode character map formats, using
    an in-memory representation of CharMapML (Unicode Technical Report
    #22) as the intermediate format.

    Currently is supports the CharMapML, YAML and UCM (write-only)
    backends; ENC, Iconv and other maps are also planned. This work is
    being comissioned as part of the OpenI18N initiative's plan to
    revise and standardize Big5-related character maps, but should be
    gernerally useful to encoding and unicode users.
